name: nulliparous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
never having given birth before: Patients who had had one or more previous live births were quicker than nulliparous patients to see a doctor about the pregnancy. Malignant diseases of the breast, ovary, and endometrium all occur more commonly in nulliparous women. Compare
primiparous
multiparous
More examplesFewer examplesThe patient is a 78 year old nulliparous woman.Our own studies in young nulliparous women confirm this observation.Hamster embryos were obtained from nulliparous young females.
